Title: You need this!!

That was always an issue. It has not leaked at all. So many colors to choose from. I get so many compliments and inquiries. Now it is a bit pricey but it‚Äôs the only one you will need. Worth it l. Get it!!

Title: easy to clean, fits in cup holder
Body: This water bottle is my new go to. I loved my hydroflask, but it never fit in my cup holder. I also liked the starbucks cups but they don‚Äôt hold enough water. This water bottle holds a lot of water, keeps ice cold, and fits in the cup holder. I saw some reviews saying it leaked, but I dropped mine off the table with the straw in and nothing spilled in the time it took me to grab it. No, you can‚Äôt put it in a bag with the straw and not expect leaks but this is good enough for me. It also is super easy to clean. I love it. I have weak wrists and the handle makes it easy to hold and carry. I will probably have this for 50 years - worth the money.

Aber ja, er sieht nat√ºrlich stylisch aus, und die Verarbeitung macht auch einen sehr guten Eindruck. Ich w√ºrde ihn vermutlich f√ºr den Preis nicht noch mal kaufen.

Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2024
Author: Sarah S
Title: Stanley cup
Body: I wanted one fast so was limited with choices and expected to pay more, understood. However the cup came with marks to the lid and was missing the usual leaflet inside, the straw was also in a wrapper, which is unusual. Only leads me to believe it was a display item. Which is fine but it was nearly double the price, so a bit disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
Author: Brayden King
Title: Holds ALOT of water, Strong/Durable
Body: I recently got my hands on the Stanley Cup and I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed with its quality and durability. This cup is built to last and can withstand just about anything you throw its way.What I love most about the Stanley Cup is its size. It can hold a lot of water, making it perfect for long hikes or camping trips where you need to stay hydrated. And despite its large capacity, it's still lightweight and easy to carry around.
